item.title: Round422ABCD
item.description: Codeforces Round422 Division 2 A Abridge problem statement 給定 A 跟 B，問 A! 跟 B! 的最大公因數，min(A, B) <= 12 Solution sketch 取 min(A, B) 直接坐階乘 AC code #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int main(){ long long int a, b, ans = 1; scanf(" %lld %lld", &a, &b); for (long long int
